author: bridge-bot
content:
<ben_a_adams> Aside I don't think changing the defaults will have a huge direct impact since all the CLs were slow in updating the defaults; which means most validators have a manual value set (as gaslimit went up before defaults were changed for mevboost)

Will be a signal; but the tardiness on changing defaults means the direct control the devs had (by the defaults being used) is gone to some degree

author: bridge-bot
content: <ben_a_adams> Is still important for the signal though; to show its supported by metrics rather than vibes
